not_found: Sorry, we couldn't find the page
loginSubTitle: Please login to see your chargeback alerts.
cannotFindEmail: We cannot find an account associated with that email. Please recheck and try again.
enterYourEmailToChangeYourPassword: Please enter your email associated with your account to change your password.
recheckEmail: We cannot find an account associated with that email. Please recheck and try again.
sentResetLinkToEmail: We have sent a password reset link to your email {{email}}
contactUsDesc: We’d love to hear from you. Please fill out this form or shoot us an email.
contactUsEmailDesc: Our friendly team is here to help.
contactUsAddressDesc: Come say hello at our office HQ.
thankyou: Thank you for writing us. We try to respond to every message. We’ll get back to you shortly.

validation.passwordLength: Password shold be more than 6 letters.

previewDescriptorsContent: These are the descriptors that are fetched from the files you might have uploaded and manually added.
downloadDescriptors: Download the descriptors for your reference.
invalidDescriptors: Invalid descriptors that does not meet the requirements have been removed
moreDescriptors: The more descriptors you add, the more protection you’ll get.
cannotModifyDescriptors: You cannot modify a descriptor once submitted.
seeTheStatus: You can see the status of these in your settings after you submit them.
monitorChargeBacks: These details helps us to monitor the chargebacks.
verifiedDescriptors: Descriptors will take up to 24hrs to 48hrs to verified.
avoidRejection: Carefully enter the names to avoid rejection.
addUnlimitedNumber: You can add unlimited number of descriptors.
viewReference: Click on the link below to view the reference.
findYourDescriptor: Find your descriptor in two simple steps
lessThan: It’ll take less than 2 minutes for you to find your descriptor
stepOne: Step 1: Open your Credit Card Statement
stepTwo: Step 2: Find your descriptor. Refer image below
openYourEmailApp: Open your email app and find your monthly credit card statement.
registerDescriptors: You can directly register descriptors to receive alerts without MID.
clickToUpload: <tag>Click to upload</tag> or drag and drop
